html: #LicoriceExtract #Glabridin 40% Glabridin is the main #ingredient in hydrophobic fraction of licorice extract affecting on skins. We investigated inhibitory effects of glabridin on melanogenesis and inflammation using cultured B16 murine melanoma cells and guinea pig #skins.pic.twitter.com/UWeTJsFLXw
text:
#LicoriceExtract #Glabridin 40%
Glabridin is the main #ingredient in hydrophobic fraction of licorice extract affecting on skins. We investigated inhibitory effects of glabridin on melanogenesis and inflammation using cultured B16 murine melanoma cells and guinea pig #skins.pic.twitter.com/UWeTJsFLXw
